title: 6 AI tools to supercharge your work and everyday life
description: Step aside ChatGPT, these helpful AI tools can automate daily tasks to make your life easier and your work more efficient.

title: Extending ChatGPT: Can AI chatbot plugins really change the game?
description: I take a deep dive into how powerful ChatGPT and other AI chatbot plugins really are. Can they actually make a difference in your work life and are they even worth it? Read on.

title: 4 ways generative AI can stimilate the creator economy
description: From generating video scripts to creating artwork, artificial intelligence tools are changing how content creators work in a big way.

title: The ethics of generative AI: How we can harness this powerful technology
description: With the great power of generative AI comes great responsibility. Here's how researchers are addressing the ethical concerns and challenges -- the biggest questions of our time.

title: Is Google's 'Find My Device' network for Android nearing? Settings signs point to yes
description: Looks like you'll soon be able to find your missing Android device with the help of other people's devices.

title: The best iPhone 15 cases of 2023
description: Buying an iPhone 15? Deck out your new device with the best iPhone 15, iPhone 15 Plus, iPhone 15 Pro, and iPhone 15 Pro Max cases that are just as stylish as they are sturdy.

title: HP unveils $5,000 foldable three-in-one desktop, laptop, and tablet, and it's wild
description: The Spectre Fold offers convenience we haven't seen before and it sports a price tag to match.

title: Ever wish your life had a soundtrack? Spotify's new Daylist feature comes close
description: Just like our moods are ever-changing throughout the day, Spotify's new playlist option seeks to match your energy.

title: This Brilliant smart home controller makes managing multiple devices easier than ever
description: A smart home with varying ecosystems and brands can get chaotic. Brilliant's new control panel sorts everything out.

title: The real-time revolution is here, but it's unevenly distributed
description: Real time is still very much a work in progress.

title: Stability AI just unveiled a text-to-music generator, and you can try it. Here's how
description: The Stable Audio app uses generative AI techniques to create music, sound effects, and audio up to 90 seconds long based on user prompts.

title: Bitwarden adds passwordless SSO to make enterprise customer lives easier
description: Bitwarden is one of the more reliable and flexible password managers on the market and it just made things even easier for enterprise customers with SSO for trusted devices.

title: How to use the iPhone 15 Pro's new Action Button to do just about anything
description: The Action Button on the iPhone 15 Pro series opens an app or function with a press and hold. Here's how to set it up.

title: OpenSUSE seeks a Leap replacement, but will distro community rise to the challenge?
description: Will it be Slowroll or Linarite -- or nothing at all? Programmers are conflicted about where the venerable Linux distro should go from here.

title: What's new in MacOS Sonoma? Here's everything you need to know
description: Finally, Apple releases details on what will be included in MacOS Sonoma -- and the list is quite lengthy. Here's a rundown of the more important features that will affect most users.

title: Mind the trust gap: Data concerns prompt customer caution over generative AI
description: A general lack of trust in data security and privacy is holding organizations back from going all in with generative artificial intelligence.

title: Singapore arms firefighters with AI glasses
description: A two-year initiative will see Singapore firefighters using 5G-enabled smart glasses to inspect and identify defects in their equipment, so they can be better prepared to respond to emergencies.

title: Buy Microsoft Office for PC or Mac for $50 right now
description: Save over 75% on a lifetime license to Microsoft Office 2021, to get Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and more on your device.

description: Standalone cameras offer flexibility, but Apple's newest iPhone challenges their dominance in the prosumer market with a surprisingly good price/performance ratio.

description: Buying an iPhone 15? Deck out your new device with the best iPhone 15, iPhone 15 Plus, iPhone 15 Pro, and iPhone 15 Pro Max cases that are just as stylish as they are sturdy.

title: How to use Norton's free AI-powered scam detector
description: Norton Genie will analyze suspicious emails and other content and alert you if a scam is afoot. Here's how to use it.

title: Google Calendar just added bookable appointment scheduling, and it's pretty sweet
description: If you've been looking for an easy way to offer bookable appointments, Google has you covered on both free and paid accounts now. Here's how to use the new feature.

title: How Apple weaved AI into the iPhone 15 and Apple Watch 9
description: AI is the buzzword of the moment, yet you rarely heard the term uttered during Apple's Wonderlust event - if at all.

title: How to set the next style in LibreOffice and why you should
description: If LibreOffice is your office suite of choice, then you should know how easy it is to customize. One option is to define what style comes, which can make you life considerably easier.
